title: SWOT Analysis of LMS Adoption in Iranian Medical Schools: A Qualitative Content Analysis-Based Study

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Case analysis course on introducing an LMS for medical education in Iran, conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment.

learning_goals: Learners can describe the seven strength factors observed in the LMS (Learning Management System) adoption case of an Iranian medical university.
Learners can critically analyze the six weakness factors that emerged during the LMS implementation process.
Learners can apply four opportunity factors for expanding medical education LMSs to real-world cases.
Learners can develop a framework to evaluate four potential threat factors in domestic and international LMS environments.
Learners can write a report proposing LMS improvement strategies based on SWOT analysis results.

resources: Medical education case study material package
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
